General.Name: Livetech da Bahia Industria
General.Description: Livetech da Bahia Indústria e Comércio S.A. manufactures, imports, and sells information technology, telecommunication, and solar energy solutions in Brazil, Latin America, and the United States. It offers broadband, fiber-to-client modems, fiber-optic cables, and network components for construction of fixed broadband networks; data transmission systems; and data center infrastructure products, such as racks, mats, cabling, no-breaks, fire, generators, and other products. The company also provides surveillance cameras, biometric access control systems, and alarms and fire detection systems, etc.; cybersecurity systems, including firewalls, internet access parental control systems, etc., as well as systems to protect against hacker attacks; lighting, electronic lock, air conditioning, and meeting room automation products; professional audio and video products; and LED panels. In addition, it offers photovoltaic solar power generators; and lithium batteries. The company distributes its products through regional internet service providers, operators, systems integrators, resellers, media and event companies, solar installers, and residential and commercial automation integrators in Brazil. Livetech da Bahia Indústria e Comércio S.A. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Ilhéus, Brazil.
